item.title: About Me
item.description: Somesh Rasal is Cyber Security Enthusiast with experience in Web Application, Android Application, Network, Thick client Vulnerability Assessment, and Penetration Testing. He is currently working as a Security Analyst in Amdocs. His industrial experience covers sectors like Banking, Manufacturing, Software companies, Telecommunication, etc. He completed certifications like Certified Ethical Hacker, Certified Hacking Forensics Investigator and Ec-Council Security Analyst from Ec-Council. Also, He completed training for Autopsy, Mobilyze and successfully passed their certification exams.
baseurl = “https://someshrasal.github.io” title: “Hello World” date: 2020-05-26T23:20:14+05:30 draft: false This is Test blog
